sentences.en: Beat it until the dough is slightly elastic.
sentences.cn: 一直搅打，直至生面团略有弹性。

sentences.en: He fitted a pebble into the catapult and pulled back the elastic. Twang!
sentences.cn: 他把石子放进弹弓里，然后往回拉动橡皮筋。“嘣”！

sentences.en: Her long fair hair was fastened at the nape of her neck by an elastic band.
sentences.cn: 她用皮筋将金色长发扎在脑后。

sentences.en: I stretched that piece of elastic to its fullest extent.
sentences.cn: 我将这条橡皮筋拉长到最大限度.

sentences.en: If export and import demand is elastic, then the change in trade volumes will operate to remove the surplus.
sentences.cn: 如果进出口需求具有灵活性，那么贸易额的变化则可能会抵消盈余。

sentences.en: If you have varicose veins, consider wearing elastic support hose.
sentences.cn: 如果患了静脉曲张，可以考虑穿弹力护腿袜。

sentences.en: Make a mask with long ears and attach a piece of elastic to go around the back of the head.
sentences.cn: 做一个带长耳朵的面具，安上一条松紧带绕过后脑。

sentences.en: Pull the elastic tight and knot the ends.
sentences.cn: 把橡皮筋拽紧，两头打上结。

sentences.en: She tied the end of her pigtails with an elastic band.
sentences.cn: 她用一根松紧带扎紧辫梢.

sentences.en: The elastic in my clothes has gone.
sentences.cn: 我衣服上的松紧带松了.

sentences.en: the horny elastic pad in a horse’s hoof
sentences.cn: 马蹄上粗硬而有弹性的肉掌

sentences.en: The lamps had a portentously elastic swing with them.
sentences.cn: 那儿路面的街灯正带着一种不祥的弹性摇晃着呢!

sentences.en: The skin darkened where it was compressed by the elastic garment.
sentences.cn: 她的皮肤上,被有松紧的胸衣束得太紧的地方,微现黑色.

sentences.en: The slacks have an elastic waistband.
sentences.cn: 这条便裤的腰带可伸缩.

sentences.en: This skirt needs some new elastic in the waist.
sentences.cn: 这条裙子需要换一根松紧腰带。

words.tran_cn: [生化] 弹性蛋白酶；胰肽酶E
[力] 弹性体，[高分子] 高弹体
使（纤维）具有弹性（elasticize的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 弹性系数；弹性常数；弹性模量
弹性区域，弹性区；弹性范围

trans.tran_en: Elastic is a rubber material that stretches when you pull it and returns to its original size and shape when you let it go. Elastic is often used in clothes to make them fit tightly, for example, around the waist.
